results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project be71fda0b85640abaf76b998f23db05c. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users can't log in when they have special characters in their password.
arguments.success_criteria: All character types are supported and there are regression tests.

results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 9faa1f9b13aa456aa40dc3aef4261c3b:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests
